alert.note: Alert for Weston; Wyoming Black Hills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 7:15PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Weston County through 745 PM MDT... At 715 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles north of Morrisey, or 13 miles southwest of Newcastle, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Newcastle around 735 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight MDT for southwestern and west central South Dakota...and northeastern Wyoming.
